item.title: About
item.description: This is a blog about software development using Java in a different way than the most common. It shows how to use more vanilla Java, functional programming, and the best lightweight libraries to create your applications, rather than unnecessary and cumbersome frameworks. This way of development brings more efficiency, performance, quality, ease of testing, and other benefits. And it’s also easier to learn, avoiding mistakes and reducing the learning curve for beginner developers on your team.
